message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose specifics about its worth to you, I can assure you that it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a chance to acquire something truly valuable at a potentially very favorable price.  Consider this offer carefully, as I have another interested party willing to pay $1500000.  Let me know your decision.
